subject: [Good] Amazon's providers may not use your data for other purposes
text:
Third-Party Service Providers [...] have access to personal information needed to perform their functions, but may not use it for other purposes
https://github.com/tosdr/tosback2/blob/master/crawl/amazon.com/Amazon.com%20Privacy%20Notice.txt#L73

this should go without saying of course, but still it's nice to see they mention it in the privacy policy, we should check if other services mention this point as explicitly as well.
